description.value:
Effect: Choose one of the following benefits:

  • Heraldic Fame: @Embed[Compendium.draw-steel.rewards.Item.WXOUw6IlP223WKuV inline]

  • Knightly Aegis: @Embed[Compendium.draw-steel.rewards.Item.AracXSWouFvjcZGB inline]

  • Knightly Challenge: You have the following ability, which can be paid for using the Heroic Resource of your class.

    • @UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.rewards.Item.vMKO7J4aBWcruWvK]{Knightly Challenge}

Special: If you take this title, you might occasionally be called upon to perform duties for the person who knighted you.

system.story: Kneel, heroes. Arise, knights of Tor, and may your swords be ever sharp in our service.

prerequisites.value: A noble or monarch grants you knighthood or a similar rank.
